acceptance_criteria: US ZIP code is required when saving a card
Card number must pass Luhn validation; otherwise show a validation error
Credit card expiration date must be in the future
CVV field is required and must be 3-4 digits depending on card type
Cardholder name is required and must contain only letters, spaces, and hyphens
Form must validate all fields before allowing submission
Error messages must be displayed next to the relevant input field
Successful payment must redirect to confirmation page within 3 seconds
